title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Culturally Inclusive Online Science Instructional Design: Inquiry-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three online science lesson design strategies to support learners from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can develop science problem-solving scenarios reflecting learners' cultural experiences by designing inquiry-based learning activities.
Learners can establish and implement a feedback system that respects cultural differences among learners using collaborative learning tools.
Learners can integrate science education simulation lessons by applying the core principles of the WisCom framework (exploring multiple solutions, building consensus, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
